languages.text: "В знак серьезности надежд, которые я питаю на ваш счет, я могу выделить в сопровождение вам Хейнрикса. Он — мой лучший агент, и я не стал бы предлагать его компанию никому, кроме самого доверенного союзника".

traits.locale_text: "В знак серьезности надежд, которые я питаю на ваш счет, я могу выделить в услужение вам Хейнрикса. Он — мой лучший агент, и я не стал бы предлагать его услуги никому, кроме самого доверенного союзника".

languages.text: "As proof of the seriousness of my hopes for you, I can assign Heinrix as your escort. He is my best agent, and I would not offer his company to anyone but my most trusted ally."
languages.original_text: "В знак серьезности надежд, которые я питаю на ваш счет, я могу выделить в сопровождение вам Хейнрикса. Он — мой лучший агент, и я не стал бы предлагать его компанию никому, кроме самого доверенного союзника".

traits.locale_text: "As proof of the seriousness of my hopes for you, I can assign Heinrix into your escort. He is my best agent, and I would not offer his company to anyone but my most trusted ally."
"As proof of the seriousness of my hopes for you, I can assign Heinrix into your escort. He is my best agent, and I would not offer his company to anyone but my most trusted ally."
"As proof of the seriousness of my hopes for you, I can assign Heinrix as your escort. He is my best agent, and I would not offer his company to anyone but my most trusted ally."
"As proof of the seriousness of my hopes for you, I can assign Heinrix as your escort. He is my best agent, and I would not offer his company to anyone but my most trusted ally."
"As proof of the seriousness of my hopes for you, I can assign Heinrix as your escort. He is my best agent, and I would not offer his company to anyone but my most trusted ally."

languages.text: 「私の望みが心からのものだという証明に、ハインリックスを護衛につけよう。彼は誰よりも優秀な職員だ。私が深く信頼する仲間にしか彼を同行させることはない」
languages.original_text: "As proof of the seriousness of my hopes for you, I can assign Heinrix as your escort. He is my best agent, and I would not offer his company to anyone but my most trusted ally."

traits.locale_text: 「私の望みが心からのものだという証明に、ハインリックスを護衛につけよう。彼は誰よりも優秀な職員だ。私が深く信頼する仲間にしか彼を同行させることはない」

languages.original_text: "As proof of the seriousness of my hopes for you, I can assign Heinrix as your escort. He is my best agent, and I would not offer his company to anyone but my most trusted ally."

languages.text: “为了表现我的诚意，我会派海因里希贴身保护你。他是我手下最出色的特工，我只会将他派到我最信任的盟友身边。”
languages.original_text: "As proof of the seriousness of my hopes for you, I can assign Heinrix as your escort. He is my best agent, and I would not offer his company to anyone but my most trusted ally."

traits.locale_text: “为了表现我的诚意，我会派海因里希贴身保护你。他是我手下最出色的特工，我只会将他派到我最信任的盟友身边。”

languages.text: «Como prueba de las esperanzas que deposito en usted, puedo asignarle a Heinrix como escolta. Es mi mejor agente y no le permitiría acompañar a nadie salvo a mis mayores aliados».
languages.original_text: "As proof of the seriousness of my hopes for you, I can assign Heinrix as your escort. He is my best agent, and I would not offer his company to anyone but my most trusted ally."

traits.locale_text: «Como prueba de las esperanzas que deposito en usted, puedo asignarle a Heinrix como escolta. Es mi mejor agente y no le permitiría acompañar a nadie salvo a mis mayores aliados».

languages.text: « Pour vous prouver ma bonne foi, je peux affecter Heinrix à votre service. Le simple fait que je suis prêt à vous confier mon meilleur agent devrait attester que je vois en vous {mf|un allié|une alliée} de confiance. »
languages.original_text: "As proof of the seriousness of my hopes for you, I can assign Heinrix as your escort. He is my best agent, and I would not offer his company to anyone but my most trusted ally."

traits.locale_text: « Pour vous prouver ma bonne foi, je peux affecter Heinrix à votre service. Le simple fait que je suis prêt à vous confier mon meilleur agent devrait attester que je vois en vous {mf|un allié|une alliée} de confiance. »

languages.text: "Als Beweis, wie ernst meine Hoffnungen in Euch sind, kann ich Euch Heinrix als Begleitung zuweisen. Er ist mein bester Agent, und ich würde seine Gesellschaft nur meinem vertrautesten Verbündeten anbieten."
languages.original_text: "As proof of the seriousness of my hopes for you, I can assign Heinrix as your escort. He is my best agent, and I would not offer his company to anyone but my most trusted ally."

traits.locale_text: "Als Beweis, wie ernst meine Hoffnungen in Euch sind, kann ich Euch Heinrix als Begleitung zuweisen. Er ist mein bester Agent, und ich würde seine Gesellschaft nur meinem vertrautesten Verbündeten anbieten."

languages.text: "Sana dair umutlarımın ne kadar ciddi olduğunun bir ispatı olarak Heinrix'i refakatine verebilirim. Benim en iyi adamımdır, onu bir müttefikimin yanına veriyorsam o müttefikime gerçekten güveniyorum demektir."
languages.original_text: "As proof of the seriousness of my hopes for you, I can assign Heinrix as your escort. He is my best agent, and I would not offer his company to anyone but my most trusted ally."

traits.locale_text: "Sana dair umutlarımın ne kadar ciddi olduğunun bir ispatı olarak Heinrix'i refakatine verebilirim. Benim en iyi adamımdır ve onu bir müttefikimin yanına veriyorsam o müttefikime gerçekten güveniyorum demektir."
